Reviews.Title: “great value for super clean hotel near museums and fun stuff in amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: texantraveler4
Reviews.Content: paid 99 euros night hotel clean quiet niceand location perfect visit van gogh museum 5 blocks street leidse square block entrance vondelpark travelling adult daughter pleasantly surprised comfy twin beds armchairs coffee table window overlooked beautiful courtyard close action keeping nightit truly peaceful retreat soundproofing marriott charging couldnt nicer didnt free wifi hotel lobby internet pay stiff surcharge

Reviews.Title: “My choice every time I go to Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: mcmiku
Reviews.Content: time chance amsterdam choose hotel location bad surprise regular customer start feel home quickly notice friendly staff little turnover familiar superior nice business trip taking 7day internet access pass laundry service front office staff willing help enjoy stay

Reviews.Title: “Great value and location!”
Reviews.Author: ENC3
Reviews.Content: stayed march 58 deal priceline 67 night hotel modern clean 128 floor lobby front hotel definitely hear noise outside wasnt bothersome nice actually view queen bed nightstands filling entire wall couch bed wall opposite bed bathroom standard size nice showertub clean toiletries included conditioner hair dryer bed slightly awkward rolling middle bed im lighter travel partner location walked anne frank house morning 15 minutes entire city center actually walkable close trams walked staff helpful offered store bags waited ready day checked helped directions questions impressed security hours key enter front door lobby elevator stay especially deal priceline

Reviews.Title: “Very good Value”
Reviews.Author: stltravelers2
Reviews.Content: stayed deal priceline 68 night fee staff helpful directions location hotel close tram system hotel typical chain hotel fine limited time actually spend internet bit expensive didnt try breakfast

Reviews.Title: “OK - nothing more / nothing less”
Reviews.Author: dutchboy81
Reviews.Content: booked hotel feel nh experience honest little disappointed hotel arrived upselling deluxe aggressively standard simply worthy stay stood ground 3 total 1 smoking positive hotels amsterdam wasnt special night stayed mercure de amstel review hotel follow honest location nh amsterdam centre doubt gone hotel kinda similar nicer touches nh amsterdam centre match reason nevertheless guess 4 hotel breakfast hand included rate superb quality finally iberia staff hotel main base overnights amsterdam spanish hotel chain spanish airline course crews soooo incredibly rude passing lift corridors acknowledge hold simply expect wait prepared shouted spanish anyway stay hotel price cause otherwise wold happy hotels amsterdam counts

Reviews.Title: “Would recommend on grounds of location and atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: OurMrsReynolds
Reviews.Content: location museum district 5 minutes rijksmuseum van gogh museum perfect getting morning avoiding queues near wonderful vegetarian restaurant called de overlooked quiet pretty street decorated comfortable appeared clean bathroom laid toilet cleaned properly bathroom fan leaving secrets staff eager help directions included free map hotel copy guide book helpful excellent value money definitely returning

Reviews.Title: “Unprofessional”
Reviews.Author: Ricoireland
Reviews.Content: arrival hotel delighted location hotel nice reception pleasant helpful booked smoking fine unpleasant smell stale smoke checked mini bar call clean informed reception sent quiet rude looked saying smell looked mini bar smell cigar smoke ages 10 minutes delivery sanitary towel believe sort joke hotels staff following day sent letter stating smoking marijuana checking rude receptionist mini bar getting checked 15 minutes told checked following 30 mins receptionist dealing woman continued checkout apologised delay reccomend hotel hotels staff overshadowed inexperience unprofessionalism
